website_summaries.verdict: These are the best space savers you can buy as they save endless room in a dorm. Great for storing unworn clothes or extra linens.
pros: Large capacity to fit an abundance of clothes and linens
These free up closet and storage space as seasonal items can be tucked away
Includes travel pump in case user does not have a vacuum
cons: Must seal completely to ensure the bag does not re-inflate

customer_reviews.title: Work exceptionally well, and are huge
customer_reviews.text: So far I put a king sized bedspread and king sized electric blanket in one bag and vacuumed the air out. It worked great. Well worth the money and reuseable
customer_reviews.author: blaineo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and have been of great use as I am trying to clear out a few closets prior to having 7 out-of-town guests here for a family wedding. They are truly the largest space bags I have ever seen and seem quite sturdy. None of them had an air leak unlike others I have had in the past. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bag works great and I underestimated the power of vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Jumbo sized bags so I could store my 8 tier tulle petticoat seen in the pictures. The bag works great and I underestimated the power of vacuum. I could have gone with the medium or large, even for such a large petticoat. Now I can store the bag in my drawer, thanks to space savers.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: These vacuum seal bags are great! Out of all the vacuum storage bags I've ...
customer_reviews.text: These vacuum seal bags are great! Out of all the vacuum storage bags I've tried, these are definitely the best. They're better quality than any others I've tried. I had no issues with them leaking air and are they're super easy to store under a bed if needed. The hand pump didn't work, but that didn't really bother me because it's faster to use a vacuum to seal it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: but I was reading the instructions and they seem to be easy to use and follow
customer_reviews.text: I received my packet on the day it said it would be delivered so this was a major plus. I haven't used the bags, but I was reading the instructions and they seem to be easy to use and follow. I am well pleased with the product and its quality. I plan on making great use of these bags.
customer_reviews.author: KittyMoka=^.^=

customer_reviews.title: perfect for storing extra bedding...
customer_reviews.text: totally met expectations...large enough for several pillows and blankets...easy to use...will definitely buy more
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Jacquin

customer_reviews.title: These are a life saver to anyone living in a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver to anyone living in a tiny apartment in the NYC/NJ area. I was able to get all off my winter stuff under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Felicies

customer_reviews.title: Easy to vacuum seal
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. Got busy loading them with blankets & bedding as soon as they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Bald Eagle

customer_reviews.title: A much better bag. The only thing I would prefer is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bags are much thicker than the Ziploc brand I have purchased in the past. Also, the jumbo size is larger than the Ziploc as well. A much better bag. The only thing I would prefer is the option to not receive the hand pump as I use my vacuum to remove the air from the bag. I want to purchase more bags and hate adding the plastic hand pumps to landfills as I try to be as environmentally friendly as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Maltese

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, defective and a total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. I vacuumed the air out and put it on the shelf and after a day or so, the air is filling the bag again. I used a slides from one of the ziplock bags to ensure it was closed and still air leaked in. In contrast, I used the Ziplock space saver bags and no such problems. You can also tell the material is very flimsy, so you have to be careful not to rip it because it will rip so very quickly. Save your money and buy the Ziplock brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cacilda Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: The bags I received do not work properly. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The bags I received do not work properly. I followed the instructions they shrink correctly but in a few days they inflate again . I tried 3 different bags out of the 4 I received. I am going to ask for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I read the directions; made sure everything was tightly closed, but it started to inflate the following day. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Lost their seal
customer_reviews.text: The bags lost their seal & took on air with 3 weeks. I’m very disappointed. Did not over fill & made sure it was well sealed when I put my quilts in. Can’t seem to find a space saving bag that works.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The large's one's are great for what I originally ordered them for. I have a light summer/spring comforter and a winter comforter that is thicker. I switch them out and didn't have a space saver bag or room for another container in my room to put the comforter I'm using in at the time. But with the large one I can fit the comforter I'm not using plus a few other small things in and not have to worry. The only downside with this package is the hand held pump doesn't work very well. I still had to get the vacuum out to finish getting all the extra air out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These came from the seller quickly and in good shape. This particular pack came equipped with a hand pump. Use a vacuum for ease and quickness. I put the pump in our 'junk drawer' in the garage. I think the hand pump would be better suited to the smaller sized bags. Mine were large and jumbo sized, excellent for extra bedding and pillows. I purchased these to move our son back to college. Saves room in the car and trips up to the dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: wireman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: They're much larger than I anticipated, but they work great! I used a vacuum first, then used the included hand-pump to get out any air the vacuum left behind and it worked wonderfully. They're really well-made too!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay deflated overnight
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. The first time I used it, I thought it did not work because I filled it too much. Then I only filled the space bag half way and vacuumed the air out.. over night it deflated. Tried it again.... deflated. If you are looking for a good space bag that deflates and keeps all of the air out this is not the product for you. Our Ziploc bags work 100x better. Unfortunately because I gave this product do many second chances I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny P

customer_reviews.title: these just don't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I received these on oct 24th and it took me about a week before i was able to try them out, i put 3 pillows in the large bag and used the pump, it stayed compressed for a couple of hours, so i went and tried the vacuum and that did the best job as far as compressing it, but then only stayed that way for about 1/2 day. They are easy to use and it is a good value if they worked but it hasn't been successful. This is really disappointing considering it was something I was interested in for travel.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: It's a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used any space savers but the time came when I had to store my beloved queen size microfiber blanket away until winter. I thought I would have to use jumbo size, but large worked fine with room to spare. I can't believe how flat my blanket became using the hand pump only! I plan to buy more and when I relocate my clothes and towels will be neatly packed in storage bags preventing the hassle of being packed in boxes and bags in the back of a moving van.
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product two months ago. I packed a comforter in the biggest bag and it’s still intact. Today for the first time I used the ‘small’ bags and I’m amazed!!! I wasn’t sure if the bag after being vacuumed was going to fit in a small carry on, and it did!!! Wow! Buy them, it’s worth it. In the bag of the picture I have three pairs of pants, seven sweaters, three of leg warmers, two hats. I could have fit more, but I didn’t want to push my luck!! Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Shetrompf

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hold a seal, found pinholes - try another brand
customer_reviews.text: I used one of the x-large bags for a couple of comforters. Zipped it up, vacuum compressed it, capped it, and a few hours later it had re-inflated. I found a pinhole in one corner and patched it with some packing tap, and vacuumed it again. But the next day it re-inflated. Not sure if I got a box that was unusually damaged/low quality, or if they’re just not well made in general, but I can’t recommend them. Try another storage bag brand. I had SpaceBags brand storage bags from BedBath&Beyond for 15 years before they wore out. These were not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amerigo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: They work soooo well and they're a great value!! I ordered these to make room to make a several hundred mile move half-way across the country and am working with little space in my car. I was worried about the space but now I have no doubts that everything will fit into my car comfortably, with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Walton

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for storage & travelling
customer_reviews.text: Just like the commercials say, you can compress clothing, blankets, comforters, etc into a much smaller size. This frees up storage space in closets, garages, or wherever. We use these on trips to save space in luggage. You can use a vacuum to suck the air out of the bag, or use the enclosed hand pump. Only takes about 15 seconds to pump the air out using the hand pump!
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: Lose air- DON’T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These storage bags are good in theory but poor in execution. They hold a good amount of clothing however they do not keep their suction. They are supposed to hold their suction for ease of storage but they DO NOT. I have to keep pulling the storage bags from under my bed and start the process of taking the air out all over again. They don’t hold suction and are a waste of time and money. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: AD1023

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay completely deflated!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased vacuum bags. I choose this brand this time because the other bags didn't all work. Unfortunately these didn't work that well either. Less than an hour after vacuum sealing them the bags started to expand. I was hoping they would stay completely shrunk but they did not. They didn't completely inflate but they did expand until the bags are very puffy! The concept is such a great space saving idea, I just wish they worked better!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet!!!

customer_reviews.title: Lasted TWO Weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 4pk, have only used 3 and only 1 of them is still compacted. These are nowhere close to the “stop line”, and after two weeks of use, 1 has completely expanded and won’t shirk, 1 has slightly expanded and shrunk back, but clearly isn’t doing its job. Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Rae

customer_reviews.title: Works well with enclosed hand pump. If slider comes off it can be easily put back on and functions normally.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but only if you lay the bag on a flat surface before attempting to seal. Why? You wind up wth a bizarre lumpy heavy thing you can't get into a container or on a shelf. Repeat the process untill you succeed.Difficult to open or seal if you have weak hands such as those with arthritis. Small works best for clothing or multiple sheet sets. I could only fit one full size down comforter in one jumbo bag but at least it is clean and protected now.
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Great Size Ranges. Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: The bags arrived quickly. I actually was able to fill 3 of them and vacuum seal them all on my hour lunch break. They do the job! Saved SO much space. I even have the smallest bag left over for smaller items to pack away. But currently, I have stored away (under my bed) FIVE Full/Queen sized comforters. Pictures say it all. That is all the room I saved with these. Will be ordering another set for pillows. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Foshee

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage and space saving.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when my handicap son visits. He never comes with decent clothing. I got tired of buying good clothing and rarely seeing it on him again. So he now has stuff here and when we got to see him. Here is what we were able to get into 1 large bag easily. All large adult males sizes. 5 shirt, 3 pants, 3 pairs of pajamas, 2 thick hoodies, 4 t-shirts, 4 pairs of socks, 2 boxers briefs, 1 pair of slippers. The vacuum seal is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags and Even Better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have used these bag during several moves during my time in the military and have ordered a couple different orders over the years . Only during my most recent move after a couple years of use did two of my bags ripped. I contacted the company and two days later I had a box of 2 jumbo bags waiting for me on my door step. Definitely a company that I will do business with again. In my opinion these bags are way better then the Ziploc brand ones.
customer_reviews.author: OR

customer_reviews.title: the bags that we have purchased deflate easily and no longer are smaller in size which is ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Space Bags for years, however, the bags that we have purchased deflate easily and no longer are smaller in size which is the reason we purchase them. We now have our bedding in your bags, had no trouble getting everything in them and so far the air is staying out. I hope for all our sake your product works better than the other products I've purchased, I will purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scarlett Binkert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!  Plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to preserve some old quilts and to hopefully free up some space in a very small hall closet. I was SO happy! These are so fantastic! The jumbo bags fit 3!!! king size quilts and reduced them down to the size of just one after the air was removed! The bags come with a pump so you dont need a vacuum if it's not convenient. I was so happy, I bought more for traveling, so we can have more room in our suitcases. These bags are reusable and sturdy! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Does it stayed sealed past two days?
customer_reviews.text: After using it one time, I checked on it three days later and the vacuum was already out of it. Is there a trick to making this work?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for under bed storage in a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed. These held a lot more than I envision. One bag has a euro pillow, two decorative pillows and two throw blankets. The other has two handmade afghans and three throw blankets. Now I just have to convince my cat that she doesn’t want to eat the bags. Only had these for about an hours so hopefully they don’t reinflate. But at the moment I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Anne

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use these for travel yet, but have used a bag for storing my king-sized down comforter and it was wonderful to see it shrink down to a size that I could easily put on a shelf for storage.
customer_reviews.author: klfindest

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss, some of these bags don't work
customer_reviews.text: The first bag I tried out (large) reinflated within minutes. I followed the instructions correctly. I tried one of the other bags and it worked great, but I was apparently sent a few bags that are worthless (defective). I'd be willing to update this review with more positivity if the seller is able to address this issue.
customer_reviews.author: PMUArtist

customer_reviews.title: Ugh! Not The One For Me
customer_reviews.text: These bags were big enough but not strong enough. Hard to close tightly and air escaped shortly after it was deflated. While moving the large loaded bag, It ripped and had to be through out. Felt like I wasted my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarno98

customer_reviews.title: Works great when they work.
customer_reviews.text: We filled about 6 of these jumbo with pillows and comforters. They seemed to work great. But they reinflated overnight. So we emptied them and repacked making sure not to go past the fill line. Used the included sliders to make sure there was an airtight seal. Vacuumed the air and put the little cap back on. Of the 6 we packed, 4 reinflated over a few days. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!  Stays deflated as long as you need it to be.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are amazing! Well sealed and easy to deflate with the enclosed hand pump! I am definitely never going to move without them again! The picture enclosed is a queen sized comforter (fluffy), bed skirt and shams. We can pack it now with plenty of room to spare in the box! I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa W

customer_reviews.title: Great if only they held the air out.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pack of 2 large and 2 jumbo bags for an upcoming trip. One jumbo worked GREAT! pillows, blankets etc. The other jumbo will NOT hold the vacuum seal. SOO frustrating! I haven't even tried the 2 large. So disappointed. Don't waste your money on a product that may or may not work.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pulcini

customer_reviews.title: These bags WORK just as promised
customer_reviews.text: I've never used this type of bag before. But I decided to try them and I'm a believer. Never going back to other types of storage bags. I've started packing up my Summer clothes and the bags work perfectly. Fill to "stop" line as directed, zip shut, put my vacuum hose on the hole and all of the air is quickly removed. I could see the bag shrinking onto the clothing as though they were being shrink-wrapped. Screw the cap back on the hole and it's ready to store and takes up so much less room. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Witch Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Don't cross the line
customer_reviews.text: We use this for king-size down comforter so we can bringing a long while rving. It works great on savings so much space. The only downfall is you need to be careful when putting the items inside the bag it is clearly marked with a line not to go past that and you need to adhere to that otherwise it will slowly deflate as we found out.
customer_reviews.author: relaxrn

customer_reviews.title: RE-Inflate! SO disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: 3 of 4 will NOT stay deflated for more than a day. My 1st time buying this type of product, Amazing at first! So impressed...then ☹ I made numerous attempts, so now I can't get a refund. I was SO hopeful...
customer_reviews.author: S Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: It's a So So product!
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved the product. It worked as advertised, but once you use it 2 or 3 times, it becomes no good. You have to be extremely careful because the ziplock bag tears for absolutely no reason. After using the the bag a couple times, it eventually does not work anymore and air seeps in after 10 or 15 minutes. I wouldn't reccomend for travel, but it's ok to use at home. I bought another pack thinking the first one was defective, but the second pack did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mali

customer_reviews.title: The storage bags are easy to use and hold several items.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags for storage. Unfortunately one of the bags will not stay deflated. Overall these bags are a great way to maximize your storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store my off-season bedding. It didn't take much for a small hole to appear while suctioning (nowhere near the bedding- at the corner seems), but it was nothing a little duct tape couldn't fix. Will keep because they do work and serve the purpose, but can't give them a 5-star due to the repairs I had to make the first use
customer_reviews.author: Kim Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I’m So Excited About My Space Saver Bags bc Being an Adult is Dumb
customer_reviews.text: First of all, apparently I don’t read dimensions bc these are HUGE. I used the hand pump and it works amazingly well. Added before and after pics of a bag that includes a twin size comforter, 2 twin size hospital blankets and a standard pillow. Already ordered some smaller ones. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay sealed they leak
customer_reviews.text: Well thought the bags were t getting small and tight enough but sealed them up put back of closet blankets pillows that side of stuff that’s bulky then last night was looking for something went to back of closet and the bags were all mushy the seal didn’t work air was getting in so pissed off . Returning going back to bed bath to buy genuine bags
customer_reviews.author: DiggyVee

customer_reviews.title: They’re fine.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for when I move long distances ( which I do pretty often) and they always, without fail, end up tearing or developing small holes along the creases. They usually hold up well enough when packed in a suitcase between other tightly cramped items, but as soon as I remove them from luggage they usually reinflate on their own. I’ve just considered it a moving expense to buy a new pack every time I have to use new ones because they are pretty cheap. I’ve recently been trying to save the ones that didn’t develop tears or holes by storing them flat and not folding them at all but it kind of defeats the purpose of condensed storage.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: They come with a lifetime warranty!!!
customer_reviews.text: These space are the answer to storage problems and they are so easy to use. I live in a small apartment with only 1 closet and use these bags for storing extra clothes. I fill the bag, seal it, remove the air with the supplied hand pump and slide it under my bed until I need it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half don't work and manufacturer not responding
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer does not stand by product guarantee which is if they reinflate for any reason if directions are followed, that they will replace them for life. I've contacted the website given twice with no response for HALF of the bags that refuse to work properly. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CoveGirl

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I sealed a foam mattress topper so it would fir in my suitcase. By morning the bag was full of air. I resealed again and same results. I put in another bag and sealed it and sealed another bag over top of it just to keep it sealed. What a waste of $$$
customer_reviews.author: Micah Epley

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer. Ordering More.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to pack all our extra comforters inside. If folded correctly. You can get two queen sized comforters in the bag. Though we recommend putting dryer sheets in between the layers. Also use a house vacuum it’s faster and draws more air out. Also sit on the bag too. Works wonders. Almost flat.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Lawson

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I got these bags so that I could store my winter attire as well as some other clothes and blankets in a storage shed for the summer. These are huuuuuge bags but I love them because they fit basically everything I had in 4 bags. It was completely easy to use with my vacuum hose. They are exceptionally large so they are good if you travel by car perhaps but not by plane obviously. They are way to big for even a 29' luggage. So far they ahve stayed flat and I shrunk them about a week ago. Will come back and edit after the summer months t see if it retained its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Got these to replace an off brand of a similar product that I had purchased at Walmart which were terrible. These are the real deal. Comes with a pump but I just use my vacuum hose to get the air out and it works and stays like a charm, the valve on the bag helps ensure this. Will only use this brand if I need more. Living in a space with little storage options, these can be vacuumed and propped upright against a back wall in a closet or under a bed. Just buy them
customer_reviews.author: stradman

customer_reviews.title: These work exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I had several large and heavy bed sets to store, sheets, comforter, shams and bedskirt. Two of the comforters were large and heavy. They took up a huge amount of space in my new apartment and this solution was perfect. It all fit with room to spare in the bags provided and the bags are thick enough that I was comfortable storing them in my outside storage area. It took some time to get all the air out, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Croft

customer_reviews.title: They weren’t kidding when they said Jumbo
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t leave reviews on Amazon but I had to this time, I am AMAZED. Family bought my daughter this giant teddy bear. She’s still kind of young to appreciate it and it’s taken up a lot of space in our small apartment so I bought a space bag in the Jumbo size hoping it would work and this exceeded my expectations. As you can see in the before photo it is HUGE. This has bought me so much space, thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: We had a fire in our home. Only basement is where fire was and contained. But the rest of the house was covered in ash and soot. every little or big thing was coated. Even our clothes. We removed all clothing out of closet and took to Laundromat and wash the Soot off with special soap along with Tide. Then after they were dry and clean we add them to the bags and put them away for storage until all the bedrooms are clean and painted. Would recomend this product
customer_reviews.author: Grace Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my birthday and I was most excited about them. You know you're an adult when space bags excite you. I used them for extra comforters and pillows that take up a bunch of space. It was so satisfying to see everything shrink down and pop back up when you're ready to use. There is not a funky smell to them. I also have 3 cats and none have popped any holes. These are nice and durable and affordable. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: samanthann92

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy Capacity
customer_reviews.text: Needed to store away a very bulky pillow top, Queen sized, mattress topper. The topper does not want to fold. So, purchased the Jumbo size vacuum bag. Got it in 2 days. pushed and squeezed the topper into the bag (took 2 of us). Zipped the bag closed and vacuumed out the air. Voila! The zipped seam held up and the topper was shrunk down to a manageable, storable size. If you have large soft goods which need to be stored, recommend you try this product. Works as claimed!!
customer_reviews.author: ETNFOLIAGELOVER

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot more user friendly now and easier to use than what I remember from my original order well over 10 years ago. I was able to get the vacuum seal on the first try with all of bags. To give testament to the thickness and durability of the bags themselves, I was able to vacuum seal an air mattress with very thick material.
customer_reviews.author: Erin E. Costello

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: After spending quite a bit of money on that other brand sold at the big blue store and being disgusted with the quality I took a chance and bought those. Not only did they hold the vacuum so far (2 months and counting) but I took them on a trip to Europe along with the little pump and they work like a charm. No need for a vacuum cleaner anymore. The pump does an equally good job. Planning on buying some more when the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Cottin

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. We're moving and have to put our stuff in storage for a little while. These bags saved me space and im not worried about water and/or bugs. They were super easy to use. I did have one bag that kept reinflating. I contacted customer service, as per the guarantee on the bag, and she sent me a replacement without a problem. I would definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: moogirl0804

customer_reviews.title: None stayed sealed
customer_reviews.text: Yup! Felt around and did not hear or feel air coming out. yet a few minute after sealing you could see the result of ___ something...do not know the problem. Getting reading to use tape and reseal the opening. I need them to work.
customer_reviews.author: M Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Saves so much room!
customer_reviews.text: An absolute necessary item for storing any extra bedding, clothes etc. Flattens my king size down comforter so it can be easily stored in linen closet without taking up much room. Also great for keeping items airtight for when storing in garage. Make sure it’s is sealed and all air is out and you are set!
customer_reviews.author: JOY CAUDO

customer_reviews.title: Do not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These did not stay sealed despite following the directions thoroughly. Reached out to the company and never got a reply even though they state that they will replace faulty bags. Poor product and no follow through on company/product guarantees.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ones I have found
customer_reviews.text: These bags seal tightly (as long as you follow the instructions). It's very easy to use the vacuum to remove the air. It's nice that it also comes with a small travel pump which I used for a trip to NYC (had to pack a down jacket). The travel pump does not remove as much air as the vacuum but it definitely did help. They have a variety of sizes -- I have jumbo bags as well as travel size bags. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T BLANKENSHIP

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I needed to store a soft goods prop the size of a medium dog. ( Full discloser: I design props for a local theater group and they wanted to keep a stuffed dog I made.) The Jumbo size was just big enough for my prop to keep it's shape. We vacuumed the air out and it looks like the dog's fur will keep well. I will review again after my prop has lived in the storage locker for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Micha D

customer_reviews.title: Not the best choice
customer_reviews.text: The bag held plenty and shrank right down. It held for about a week then started to release. The little clips are easily lost
customer_reviews.author: Nanak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & definitely save space
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing vacuum storage bags, so I don't have anything to compare them to. However, these bags were incredibly easy to use and hold a lot! I loaded three of them up with all of my quilts, duvets and blankets that I do not use most of the year, vacuum packed them, and slid them underneath my bed. They have allowed me to free up a lot of closet space in my spare bedroom. I am definitely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C Fritsche

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to seal properly
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers said bags were not airtight and did not hold a seal. I originally had that problem but it is because I did not seal it completely. Be sure to "zip" the bag completely shut after filling it. I used my fingers over a cloth to be able to slide them firmly along the "zipper" back and forth several times to make sure it was fully "zipped". Then, after deflating the bag, be sure to screw the cap on completely. Once I did those things, the bags have held their seals (for several weeks now, since I bought them).
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum seal doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I used the extra large to store two comforters initially it seemed to work well, but the vacuum seal only kept for two days and then the bag blew up again out of the storage container. I read all the usage instruction and tip and ensured everything was done correctly. The only reason this gets two stars instead of one is because they bag didn't bust, so I guess it's a decent storage bag, just not vacuum storage.
customer_reviews.author: GSM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: I fly out in less than a week and I was planning on using this for traveling. On the first use, two of the four bags sprung a leak! I reached out to the company as it says on the bag that they will replace for life and I got an email saying that it is only for companies, military, or government that they will supply. I only bought it because of the portable pump, which was a great idea, but don’t waste $20.
customer_reviews.author: LeahRochelle

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily
customer_reviews.text: Lovely when in fact, but PLEASE be careful when moving them when deflated especially on concrete/sandy floors. They tear incredibly easily. Also hand pumping is a bit exhausting and the plastic pump gets hot from kinetic energy build up.
customer_reviews.author: N.Bae

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not keep air out. Tried multiple ways ( including the correct way) to fasten it and the air always makes its way in. This happened with the 2 I used out of how ever many it came with.
customer_reviews.author: mca

customer_reviews.title: Works, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: They work to save space. I use them for pillows and blankets. Some worked great, others had issues with the zipper clip, a couple reinflated after some days. Update: After some time half the bags keep reinflating
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Pérez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with these at first. They hold a lot, very easy to use, but about 3 weeks later I see that all of the air has returned to the bag. Zipper is still intact, foam puck in place, cap sealed tight....I don't know if the pack I received was defective or if these are just a waste of money and not meant for long term use? Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jadyn

customer_reviews.title: I sucked the air out with a vacuum on two bags
customer_reviews.text: I know the description said large, but I didn't read the actually inches. They are so huge, I put a comforter and sheet set inside one and still had lots of extra space. I sucked the air out with a vacuum on two bags. One stayed vacuum packed and the other didn't. I haven't checked the one that didn't stay small yet, but it's probably because I didn't ziplock it down all the way or something.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best tool for travelers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am planning a trip to Italy and flying on stand-by. So, I really needed to pack with a carryon only. This was my first time trying a saver bag, because i didn’t think they really worked. I was extremely pleased with this product, and i don’t think i will travel any other way from now on. I was able to pack more than i planned, and with ease. I would definitely recommend this space saver bag. I must also mention this portable air pump worked extremely well, I didn’t even use a vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Needed to 'Space Save' some quilting supplies. Put the material in the bag, followed directions to vacuum air out and it looked GOOD. An hour later, looked like I hadn't vacuumed air out at all..Tried again checking seal, for holes, etc. Nope. Didn't hold the vacuum. Did this 4 times to no avail. Wish I could send them all back.
customer_reviews.author: Mirusel

customer_reviews.title: Spacious bags
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for storing winter sweaters and bedding. The bags were huge and I like that not time was spent vacuuming the air out of the bags. The problem for me is where to store them. Very please with the functionality of this product and will purchase again in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn DeGannes

customer_reviews.title: Won't keep seal, doesn't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 6 months now and after multiple attempts the bags keep on inflating and lose their vacuum seal. This happens on multiple bags.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ellwein

customer_reviews.title: Easily tears at the crease lines causing air leaks back
customer_reviews.text: I bought the jumbo size. I didn’t overfill the bags, but they were easily torn with micro holes at the crease line. Air leaked back to the bags over time. I bought 4 jumbo bags and all 4 leaked. Poor quality product. Will not bought this product ever again!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Able to put comforter in them & compact them for storage!! Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Will be using this for traveling with pillows ☁️
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I just got it today. I will be using this for my pillows for travel. They say you can re-use the bags but I’ve yet to try. I was surprised how huge the bags are. I will update you guys on how re-using the bags goes.
customer_reviews.author: Lex Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Functional but Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I needed the large one for a big blanket but the large one came not holding a vacuum seal and fills it back with air. I’ve used one of the medium sized ones out of the kit and it has worked
customer_reviews.author: Weasel

customer_reviews.title: Hard to seal, bad closure system which allows air to leak out.
customer_reviews.text: Closure mechanism is very poor design. Very difficult to close and keep closed. Need to use "ziploc" mechanism to ease closure operation and keep sealed. Bags leak slowly and expand. Good for simple storage but useless for reducing bulk.
customer_reviews.author: nodrog

customer_reviews.title: Xl bags are junk
customer_reviews.text: The two Xlarge bags would not stay compressed. Missed my return window Otherwise they would be going back. got better bags at dollar tree!
customer_reviews.author: SmithFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags!!! I got the package with one of each size and the travel pump. I travel a lot and these let me pack more into my smaller suitcase for carry on. Highly recommend Side note: the pump works well just takes a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: faulty bags
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time try to get them to hold vacuum, or your money for these faulty bags. I use bags to store winter comforters and bedding. Initially I was really impressed, they compressed quickly, and I did them all at once. 2 of the bags inflated over the few hours, I resealed it and comoressed once more. A day later all of them have no compression.
customer_reviews.author: chi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to store winter bedding. We have 4 super thick winter blankets that take up a lot of space. I was happy to find that one of the jumbo bags holds all 4 of the blankets and compresses down to less than half the space they would use on their own. Very happy with the purchase, the bags are great quality!
customer_reviews.author: A. Webb

customer_reviews.title: No comparison!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the ziploc version because they were in store, sitting right in front of me when I was inspired to use space saver bags. Since then, two of the ziploc ones have developed holes and decided to replace them on Amazon. Seeing that the origin space saver bags had much better reviews I gave the a chance. The original space saver bags are WAY better, thicker, more durable, wider(which, when your filling a jumbo bag, makes a difference trust me). This is my space saver brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Always a useful product
customer_reviews.text: Getting ready to pack up for our annual drive from a winter in Florida back to our home in Maine. I rely on these bags to pack up linens and other soft goods to make more room in the small cargo trailer we tow behind our Jeep. Four months away means we bring some stuff! Came earlier than promised. Thanks for the quick service!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Payne

customer_reviews.title: % are defective
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these bags for years. The idea is great and when they work, they are terrific, but over the years the quality has decreased and recently the percentage of defective bags has increased. My last order was for 4 bags and 2 wear defective, they didn't stay deflated. The zipper is closed correctly and the air is removed, but within a few hours, the bag fills with air again. It is impossible to locate or patch the leak, there are no visible holes or broken seals. 2 out of 4 is a 50% loss; it is Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Glassman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always keep a seal.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I received the SpaceSaver Premium Vacuum bags and again, the Jumbo size is defective. I folded a quilt in the bag being sure it did not go beyond the sealing rim and again, it would not keep the seal.
customer_reviews.author: peprmint

customer_reviews.title: These bags are awesome for moving!
customer_reviews.text: We are moving a few miles away from where we live. Rather than through soft stuff in cars for a gazillion trips, these bags are super easy to use, much easier to manage and can be prepared way ahead of time for things that you won’t use regularly before you move. Much neater process on moving day - just grab and go!
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper Sacto

customer_reviews.title: Still Don’t Work
customer_reviews.text: Tried these years ago and every one leaked within a short period of time. Figured I’d try the updated version. First time I deflated it, I could hear air leaking through the valve. Retried it- 2 days later it is half reinflated. Don’t waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Bookman52

customer_reviews.title: Not a great bag
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this type of bag for a long time. I have some that gave been closed for years. These bags didn't stay airtight for a day. I used them for moving. I had to keep sucking the air out. They popped the box right open.
customer_reviews.author: criscb

customer_reviews.title: One deflated bag after couple months
customer_reviews.text: Seem very durable and strong material. We got these to storage our king size down blanket. The seal part was easy and the bag is perfect size for our blanket as well. However, our only complaint is that the sealed bag is deflated after couple months. A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: YH

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after 1 season and easily punctured when moving
customer_reviews.text: All these bags failed for me, back to researching to find a better quality. I store this stuff in my basement and when I moved 2 of them they just touched a concrete wall and were punctured. I would guess that if you’re storing these in a closet they would be okay but not for the basement
customer_reviews.author: whome1269

product_meta.title: Spacesaver Premium Vacuum Storage Bags. 80% More Storage! Hand-Pump for Travel! Double-Zip Seal and Triple Seal Turbo-Valve for Max Space Saving! (Jumbo 4 Pack)
feature_bullets: 4 x JUMBO SIZE BAGS FOR EXTRA LARGE ITEMS! Can fit 4 pillows or 1 queen size bedding set per bag! Store away your duvet, bed sheets, towels, blankets, and more! 80% more space than other bags on the market!

SQUEEZES EVERY BIT OF AIR OUT OF THE BAG! The unique Double-Zip Seal and the Triple-Seal Turbo Valve are designed to get every ounce of air OUT of the bag in the suction process – and nothing gets back in! Other storage bags let air back in, and defeat the purpose. Not these!

INCREASE YOUR STORAGE SPACE without having to clean out your closet! Our Spacesaver bags are an ideal solution for adding more storage space to your wardrobes, closets, garages, basements, lofts, and suitcases.

FREE TRAVEL PUMP INCLUDED! When you’re travelling and want the MOST space so you don’t have to take a lot of luggage, these storage bags are PERFECT! And when you have to re-pack for the return trip, just use our FREE convenient Travel Pump, and your bags will be air-tight vacuum-packed again!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,970 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
